name: ionic3-image-viewer
description: Ionic 3 component providing a image viewer

scripts.build:link: node ./gulp/task-build.js && npm link && cd demoApp && npm link ionic3-image-viewer && cd ..
scripts.build:publish: node ./gulp/task-build.js && npm link && cd demoApp && npm link ionic3-image-viewer && cd .. && npm publish
scripts.serve: npm link && cd demoApp && npm link ionic3-image-viewer && ionic serve
scripts.repair: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf .tmp && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && node ./gulp/task-build.js && npm link && cd demoApp && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf www && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && npm link ionic3-image-viewer

author: Okan Beydanol
